title: Monochrome Beauty
rules: Create with a single primary color. Use light and shadow for contrast.

title: City in 15 Seconds
rules: Record a 15-second vertical video of urban light or sound.

title: Color Ripples
rules: Create an image themed around flowing color. Abstract elements are welcome.

title: Three Shapes
rules: Compose using only a circle, a triangle and a square.

title: Light Through the Window
rules: Use a cast of natural or artificial light as your main subject.

title: Textural Macro
rules: Capture close-up textures. Emphasize detail and form.

title: Mirror Symmetry
rules: Build symmetry via mirror or real reflection.

title: Write One Word
rules: Choose a word that represents your day and present it in a unique way.

title: Three-Color Constraint
rules: Use only three colors in the entire piece (black/white not counted).

title: Object Personality
rules: Give a small daily object a persona using angle and light.
